11.content: Everyday is always weird in the town of Elmore. But things are going to get weirder for the Wattersons and the rest of Elmore. The day begins with...
11.title: Amazing World of Gumball

111.content:
Richard drove to the Elmore mall parking structure. It was almost empty as many of the mallgoers parked in the area in the front of the mall. Though for Richard he was okay with that as he wasn’t there to enter the mall. Once in the middle level he parked and exited out his car. He looks around and not finding what he was looking for at first making him sad. But that changes when he saw the large red van in his sight making him become excited. He watches as the side door opens up and then he sees a pair of glowing eyes peering through the darkness inside the van. “Ah, if it isn’t one of my favorite customers. Welcome back Mr. Watterson. You planning to browse and shop around my shop?“. Richard replies, “You bet I am!”. The figure with eyes only revealed chuckles and says, “Well then... come on in”. Then a pair of shadow like arms reached out and grabbed the large pink bunny pulling him into the van.

It was completely dark until there was light making it visible to see around Richard. The inside of the van was much larger as Richard looked like he was inside a shop instead of a vehicle. He walks around picking up a few things like a comic for Gumball, a new fish bowl for Darwin, couple of dolls for Anais, and a bunch of appliances that he and Nicole could use or to be more specific he would most likely use. It was then he saw something under a spotlight catching his eye. It looked like a shooting device with a couple of various buttons that fueled Richard’s imagination by looking at it. “*gasp* A ray gun! I always wanted one. How much is it?”. The “store” owner’s eyes grew bigger from shock then saying, “Wait... how did that get there. I’m sorry but that is not for sale”. Richard quickly replies, “I’ll give you twenty five dollars”. “I assure you, you don’t want this”. “Awww. How about 50?”. The store owner was struggling but he kept saying no. “100!”. The figure couldn’t resist the money offered and says, “Deal!”. Richard quickly took out a hundred dollars plus extra for the other items he picked out. Richard then pulls on the van door nearby exiting from the larger space contained in the van to back to inside the parking structure. “Pleasure doing business with you Mr. Watterson”. Richard walks away looking mesmerized by the device thinking it was a toy ray gun while walking toward his car. The awesome store owner watches as Richard drives away then talks to himself. “Hmm... was it the right call to let him purchase the device? After all that device causes many effects when used”. He chuckles a bit then says, “I’m sure he won’t be able to figure out what it can based on his “intelligence”. It was then he can hear police sirens coming toward him where he says, “Oh man... not again”.

Richard made it back home and parked in front of the house. He makes his way inside the house where he sees his kids watching tv. “I’m home!”. Gumball, Darwin, and Anais all yell out “Dad!” then give him a hug. Richard then presents his gifts to them where they notice they were knockoffs. “These are all from the awesome store aren’t they?”. Richard replies, “Yeah... what’s wrong? Don’t you like them?”. They shrug and accept his gifts. Nicole comes in to greet her husband then asks, “You didn’t pay too much for those things, did you?. Richard eyes the “ray gun” then looks back at Nicole and goes, “Noooo...”. Nicole just sighs and continues cleaning around the house. Richard immediately went to his bedroom and started changing. When he came back out, he was wearing only a cape, his underwear, and old fish bowl of Darwin’s to use as a space helmet giving his visual interpretation of a space hero. This surprised his kids and they watch in embarrassment as he role plays pointing in one direction and says, “Take this you evil aliens!”. He pulls on the trigger of the device but nothing happens. He was concerned and pulls the trigger some more and even shakes it but still nothing happens. Gumball has a disappointed look on his face as he says, “Well that was a waste of money”. Richard lets out a sigh his ears drooping then says, “Aww. The awesome store always has great things. Why didn’t it work?”. He then looks at Gumball handing the device to him and says, “Here, son. Can you get rid of this for me? I’m gonna go in the kitchen and fill my sadness with donuts. Gumball and Darwin watch as Richard slumps away toward the kitchen.

Gumball examines the device while Darwin asks, “I wonder why the thing didn’t work”. Gumball notices a slot what looks to be where the batteries are placed. He opens it up to see the problem as the battery inside wasn’t fully slotted in. Once pressed in the device started lighting up and seems to be functioning. “Look! It’s working now. We should tell Mr. Dad” Darwin says excited. Gumball replies, “Dude... I don’t think this is a ray gun. It probably does something else“. Darwin rubs his flipper under his chin and says, “Why don’t you press one of those buttons and see what they do”. Gumball thought about and agrees to press one of the buttons with no labels having no idea what any of them do in which he pressed....
111.title: Richard visiting the awesome store

1111.content:
Gumball pressed the first button he saw and the device started to buzz and light up. Then all of a sudden Gumball yelled out, “Ah! What the what?!”. Darwin confused asks, “What’s the matter dude?”. Gumball replies, “The thing bit me or something”. Darwin lets out a laugh and says, “Come on bro we know that machines don’t bite. At least not without a reason. Gumball looks at his paw that was holding the device and noticed a blotch of fur has disappeared leaving a little naked spot. Little did he know that device was taking a bit of his DNA from the fur in order to start the next phase. “We need to destroy this thing. It’s evil! Gumball started raising his arm holding the device ready to throw the device at the floor to destroy it. But Darwin grabs his arm stopping him. “No dude! Mr. Dad spent a lot of money for that thing. We can’t just break it just like that”. “Let go!”. Then Gumball and Darwin start fighting over the fate of the device having each both hands on it with the device between paws and flippers.

During the struggle, one of them accidentally pulls the trigger on the device. Then a small blue beam was shot out of the device where they both scream. “Look out!” They both hit the ground to avoid the blast. The beam started bouncing off the walls and hitting all over the living room. The beam then bounced out of the living room and into the kitchen. There Richard was eating a box of donuts holding one of the donuts in his hands. He closes his eyes to enjoy that sweet donut where he fails to notice the beam coming in. The beam bounces around the kitchen walls even passing through the donut hole of the donut hole Richard was holding then exiting. This finally got Richard’s attention making him look around then shrugs it and takes a bite out of the donut. The beam returns into the living room where the boys return to duck and dodging. It then all ended when the beam...

12.content: Ok, starting out, what type of character are you going to be?
12.title: Fairly OddParents

choices: Timmy heads down to the kitchen to have a bowl of cereal, his mom is there
Timmy goes to take a hot shower and while in there begins to feel strange
Timmy skips breakfast and goes outside to play with his fairies
121.content:
(Note: a lot of the rules for wishes from the cartoon series still apply here, though the fairies are a lot more permissive about the type of wishes they will grant)

One fine morning in Dimmsdale, Inside a small, unassuming suburban house with a one-car garage, within a darkened upstairs room, a young boy with neatly combed brown hair was snoring softly. Next to the slumbering child was a round bedside table upon which rested a little pink hat and a fishbowl containing a little castle structure and two ordinary-looking goldfish with no extraordinary characteristics whatsoever, at least, it would seem that way from an outside observer. In truth, they were anything but ordinary, and they're about to show why.

One of the grinning goldfish (who had pink eyes) gleefully turned to her mate and announced, "Alright, we do it on three."
The green-eyed goldfish nodded with enthusiasm and began the count down.

"One."

"Two."

"Threee..."

The fishbowl rocked with a whirlpool of sparkles and foam before two mystical beings burst forth and out into the open air.

"Wake up Timmy!"{/c }, they shouted, forcing the young boy's eyes open.

"Yaaaaaah!" Timmy screamed, as frantically kicked at his bed, sending him off the edge and onto the ground in a jumbled heap.

Just as quickly he jumped to his feet and foggily muttered, "Whowhatwherewhowha--? ...Cosmo? Wanda?"

"Good morning Timmy!" they announced simultaneously.

Timmy winced at the loud outburst from his fairies and moved to wipe the sleep from his eyes. "Ugh, what time is it?"

Wanda Poofed! into a pink alarm clock and floated near to Timmy's face. "It's 6:30 a.m. on Saturday, sport., a perfect time to get up and get a jump on the day. Why, who knows what today will bring, what kind of adventures you'll have, or how many new friends you'll make. The early bird gets the worms, you know."

"Or in this case, if you sleep like the dead, the worms will come to you." Cosmo piped in with his usually unhelpful advice.

Wanda glared hotly at her husband, and then fired a bolt of electricity from her wand, turning him into a pile of ash with eyeballs. "Yay that hurt!" he cheerfully said, prompting an eye roll from Wanda.

Timmy yawned deeply, then began crawling back into bed and pulling the covers back over. "Yeah, well, this birdy plans on sleeping in a little bit longer, say until about noonish. Don't go waking me up until then"

Wanda frowned, then magically lifted the poor drowsing godchild up and instantly poofed him out of his pajamas and into his street clothes before setting him back on his feet.. "Now, Timmy, a good night's rest is important, but I also think you need to learn how to wake up early and seize the day. After all, you're only a kid once so you should try to make the most of it."

Timmy, who was barely paying attention and had one foot planted squarely in Dreamland, absentmindedly nodded and said "*Yawn*, ok Wanda, I guess since you're clearly not going to let me sleep, we'll do it your way."

He paused for a moment, pondering something, then muttered to himself, "I wonder what Mom and Dad are doing?"
121.title: Timmy Turner's (sexual) Awakening

choices: Hide it! They could take it away while explore the setting.
Shrink yourself and have fun with it.
Mess some of the characters for your enjoyment.
123.content:
You are Anon.

You're unremarkable person, just an random Joe with a normal boring life and rather alone, since you pretty much skill on girls but it's alright, though. Your life is quite standard with a cozy apartment.

Besides, you don't wanted to reveal that you were still watching cartoons.

Now, you're not some man-child, just some man admiring the animations and writing of some of the classics and few other gems out there in TV and Web and besides! After watching movies and TV series, recognizing repeating actors has become a bit tad annoying and boring, even if the movie is good.

Well that's what you say to yourself.

You turn on the TV and went to watch the Fairy Oddparents Rerun, an good show and memorable characters and plot, one of the best of Butch Hartmann

You were about to turn on the volumen but then your Phone buzzed all suddenly.

It was a text message but quite odd too, the number was marked as unknown and the message reads as if it were from a contest.

"Congratulation, Anon!

You had been winner of our newest and duper super prize for being an primary and most faithful watcher!


Again, it was odd, you didn't expected anything involving it, you hadn't subscripted into anything really and it seems like a spam and trash mail but it you continue to read

You are now the proud owner of a magic control from the show! It also work as dimensional portal! Just point on the show or movie you want to get in you are for an adventure! It also an reality changing device totally bound to you!

Enjoy it winner! You deserved it!


Really? What a stupid message, you might like cartoon but you aren't stupid to believe this load of bull- EEK!'

...

...

...

Something big and pink fell on your lap, you tentatively look down to see that... well, it was the same TV control from the show, down to the excess of buttons and other things,, it was also sparkling.

You grab it, somehow it was warm on the touch, then you out looked on the phone, reread the message and looked on the thing that apparently now belongs to you.

It can't be real, right?

Right?

Well...

There was only one way that find out.

You point on the TV and pressed a button and.... nothing.

"Well... that was anticlimatic- WHOOOoaaaaaahhhhhh~~!!!" And those were your last words as your TV turned into a magical portal that sucks you and your new control in.

***

You woke up with a groan as you got up from the hard floor and open your eyes.

Then quickly come to regret your decision as you were blinded by the bright and colorful, you let your eyes abjust to the light only to notice something off..

Everything was now looking colorful and if it come out of an 3D CG animation that still looked quite 2D on the surface, like a cartoon but the neighborhood looked quite familiar..

Where this was.

"Twerp!" The familiar voice kind of cought you off guard as you snapped and looked back only to notice the familiar looking house with evil red head teen yelling a very recognizable eternal 10-year old.

You blinked twice then pinched yourself in various area of your body but still, you weren't on a fever dream!

You were in Dimmsdale, you were in the show! Or rather the dimension of the show.

You picked on the control again and looked it, hard. In your hands was a powerful tool you could use to...
123.title: Welcome to Dimmsdale

As soon, you saw you were able to shrink by pressing a buttom, you pressed it and hard, shrinking to an 1-inch tall with the control, making everything look super big, you didn't wanted to be discovered lie... wait, you like you did belonged to the show, just like the episode on where the control debuted, where it changed the art style when appearing in different shows.

Still.

With a nigh universal remote in your possession, it was better if nobody were able to see it, much less you.

Besides, you could have fun in this size!

You had an kink for size difference and you could certain fun things with many of the female casts of FOPs, besides, you weren't in the show itself you were in the reality of the show so things might get a bit different while still adhering to cartoon logic.

Now... decisions...

Where to go.

155332111.content:
It was the beginning of class where Tommy and the rest of his friends where all in one class given a lesson by their teacher. It was then they heard an announcement In the p.a. system that there would be a special assembly in the gymnasium for a special surprise. Immediately all the students including Tommy and all his friends started heading to the gym with Tommy holding a video camera to record of that big surprise. Tommy gathered with Chuckie, Kimi, Lil, and Phil with Angelica and Susie behind them with their class. “What do you think they have for us to see Tommy?” Chuckie asks. “I don’t know but I’m pretty excited to find out”. The rest of their friends were all curious as well. Angelica scoffs and replies, “I would rather be getting all the attention or back at home already”. Susie just rolls her eyes and says, “Come on Angelica. This probably can be fun”. It was taking a bit longer until they heard the principal getting all their attention then reveals what the assembly was for. A couple of people in suits appear and a giant device was revealed that was as tall as an adult. Every student were in all in awe curious what it was and what it does. The men in suits were about to explain until they heard a bell ring. It was break time so the principal lets them all go and tell all the students to come back for the presentation. Almost everyone left even the men in suits except for Tommy and his friends and family. They all got closer to get a better look at the device until Tommy just straight up got next to it. “Tommy! info.brief_description: Random Cartoon Characters going through changes involving fetishes
info.description:
I know this is being similarly done by other writers but I just wanted to take a crack at it myself so I can make chapters myself and make edits if needed to. There will be many cartoon shows where the characters that will go through changes based on many fetishes where you decide what happens to them. I hope to make many chapters involving many shows for you to read and if you feel like joining in then by all means make some creative chapters for the characters

ALLOWED:
Pregnant (adult or young)
Unbirth (Age range same as Pregnant)
Vore (More than just oral if you like)
Breast expansion
Cock and Ball growth
Cock Vore (If you're into that)
Sex (Incest is fine as well, but no gay please)
Body Inflation And Growth
Age Prgression and Regression
Micro/Macro
Endo

NOT ALLOWED:
Death (Please Don’t kill characters)
Watersports
Scat
Mpreg
Diapering (Only babies get diapers)

*Any other fetishes not mentioned is allowed but might change if one I find I might consider disturbing*

Enjoy the chapters and have fun if joining and creating your own chapters
